brainly_data.question: How do Islamic reform movements disagree with fundamentalist beliefs? A. Reformers believe in a less strict interpretation of the Qur’an. B. Reformers believe in the subjugation of women. C. Reformers believe in Sharia law as a central political and social force. D. Reformers want to see more American pop culture in society.
brainly_data.subject: History

all_answers.subject: History
all_answers.text: Ans//// (A) Reformers believe in a less strict interpretation of the Quran///// Good Luck
